hipparcos.sky
Class SkyArea

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Canvas
              |
              +--hipparcos.sky.SkyArea
public class SkyArea
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements StarStore

This class is basicaly a plotting canvas for stars centered on a given coordinate. It implements StarStore (hipparcos.tools) which means it can be populated in the background using a StarLoader.

See Also:
